translation: Catch ya later!
I got no business in a flashy place like this! Let's move on.
Once they start moving, we'll go.
Right!
A little sightseeing wouldn't hurt, would it?
Come on, we're in Costa del Sol! Costa del Sol!
Can we find some shade somewhere?
It's unbearably hot.
You could shave your fur!
Welcome to Costa del Sol! I'm Kapono, the mayor.
Go on.
Here's a little something for you.
Because no vacation in Costa del Sol is complete without one!
It suits you perfectly!
Welcome to a sun-soaked paradise, where blessings from above shower down upon you at this ultimate resort.
Leave your dull everyday life behind and enjoy to your heart's content!
Welcome, one and all!
Hey, is that the beach over there?
But first, let's find a hotel and get cleaned up.
You better not be thinkin' we should all go for a swim.
I saw what you did! Don't think I missed it. You two said it all without words!
Why are you people here?!
No, don't bother telling me. Nothing good ever comes from getting involved with you lot.
I'm here on a business trip with one of the execs. Just make sure you don't cause any trouble.
Today we're bustling with visitors who attended the parade in Junon.
All the popular hotels are fully booked.
I could suggest a recently opened hotel...
But just between us, it's best to avoid it due to some shady connections.
I'm terribly sorry, but we are fully booked for tonight.
Welcome. Would you like a room?
Please enjoy your stay.
Today we're only accommodating guests with reservations.
We look forward to your next visit.
Welcome, please make yourself comfortable.
Take care and travel safe!
Hey there, kid. How'd you like to be a hotel owner in Costa del Sol?
I've got just the deal for you.
How about a property for a tenth of the usual price?
Can't really get into why it's so cheap, but there's a seller eager to make a deal.
C'mon, it's a popular tourist spot. You'll earn your investment back fast!
Tifa! Cloud, my bro!
Tifa!
No way... Johnny?
Whew! Hey, guys! Lookin' good!
Same to you. So...what're you doing here?
Livin' the dream─buildin' my legend!
Bein' the owner of a bona fide hotel!
...Though not exactly a luxury one.
What a coincidence! We were just looking for a place to stay. Do you have any rooms?
Do I have rooms? I got rooms for days! Enough rooms to make your head spin!
We've had zero guests since we opened...
You sure about this?
Come on, we're friends, right? No need to be shy.
Alright, let's get going.
Now?
Yeah, hurry up!
Make sure to stick close! Can't have my guests getting lost!
Over here!
This way!
Just bought this place, so it's a bit of a mess right now, but it's got some real potential!
Oh man, it's a long story...
I left Midgar ready to take on the world, but I had no job, no money, and no girlfriend. It was rough.
I was just lying there in an alley like a piece of trash when Mayor Kapono found me and gave me a chance.
He gave me the opportunity of a lifetime with a special, super cheap property!
Can you believe it? Half the market price! And he even loaned me the money!
I was so touched by his kindness...
Hey, where are you going!?
Hey, everyone!
Welcome to my palace: Johnny's Seaside Inn!
Oh... um... yeah, it's nice...
Right? Right?
For a 'seaside,' it sure ain't got no sea view.
It’s not about what you see. It's about what you smell.
There it is! The fresh scent of the sea!
Alright, come on in!
Welcome to Seaside Johnny's!
Your rooms are ready: Tifa, you're in Room 101. Aerith, you get 102.
As for the guys, you'll be sharing Room 103.
And the cost?
For you, Tifa, it's on the house! Today is─
Oh, pardon me, I have to go. Mayor Capono needs me.
You've got the place to yourselves today, so make yourselves comfortable.
Johnny again!
If you're heading to the beach, make sure to change first.
And no weapons allowed on the beach, got it?
Man, I'd kill to see Tifa in her resort wear!
Ready for that shower?
Yeah, I think so.
Alright, see you in a bit.
And how long's 'a bit'?
Well, we're on vacation. Let's take it easy.
Right, Tifa.
Exactly, Aerith.
Fine, fine. You win.
Guess I'll take a look around. Though...maybe I should change first.
This is what I'm talking about.
Alright, I'm heading out ahead.
The breeze feels so nice. This place is quite the fine inn.
Is this supposed to be a bed? I feel like the bottom's gonna fall out if I sit on it.
Oh no! The shower's broken...
Sorry, but I need you to stay here.
Hey there, buddy! Why are you staying in a rundown place like this? I know a spot that's much nicer.
You saw the inside, didn't you?
This rundown inn isn't even worth a hundred gil, yet the owner's drowning in debt.
Hard to believe there are still people who fall for such tricks these days, huh?
Costa! Are you here all by yourself?
It's such a waste to be here at the beach all alone!
Well, I have some exciting news for you.
Here in Costa del Sol, we're hosting an event to help guests meet new people.
We'll make sure you have some wonderful, love-filled memories.
Join us at 'Costa del Amor'!
Join us at 'Costa del Amor'!
So, how about joining us?
Not interested.
I've got business with someone. Later.
Oh my, friends of yours? Well then, how about you handle this for us?
Those robed folks are a bit odd, don't you think? They've gathered on the beach and it's spooking everyone.
Ignoring the dress code is such a buzzkill.
Could you please take them somewhere else? We'd really appreciate it!
By the way, you won't get onto the beach dressed like that either.
This is Costa del Sol! Time to let loose and have some fun!
Take it.
Here, have ticket number seven.
With it, you can join the Pirate's Rampage and Card Carnival events.
Someone with the same number should be waiting for you at the event. Find your partner and team up!
Work together with your partner to clear the games, and you'll receive an Amor card!
You can trade the card for resort wear.
Once you pass the dress code, you'll be able to create wonderful memories!
Hula dancers
Now, go and enjoy your vacation in Costa!
May you find the perfect encounter!
Costa!
Hula dancers
Excuse me~
Today, you can't enter the beach unless you're wearing resort wear.
If you're heading to the beach, please change into resort wear!
Looks like we need to get some new clothes first.
Dum-da-dum, da-da-dum~♪ Da-da-dum-da-da-dum~♪
Hey, Cloud. Want some ice cream? Or are you looking for a different kind of treat?
Come on, admit it. Mesmerized by my cute swimsuit, aren't you?
"Mesmerized by my cute swimsuit, aren't you?"
Yeah. Totally.
Not interested.
Stop bothering us.
Yeah. Totally.
Wait, really? I didn't expect you to notice beauty.
Hey, how about letting me join your team? I can be quite useful, you know.
Not interested.
Hah, there he is! The guy who's too cool to care about anything!
But, if you make me part of the team, I'll make it worth your while. Deal?
Enough already. Stop getting in our way.
Hmph. Can't say I get what you mean.
But if you let me join, maybe we'd start understanding each other better, huh?
I promise I'll make things more fun! And the team could use a dose of youthfulness.
Yuffie
What is with those guys?
Way to ruin the mood.
Oh, you made it.
I hear the guys in black cloaks are gathering.
Yeah…
It's not like they did anything.
Still, everyone's scared or creeped out by them and treat 'em like stray dogs.
So creepy…
Hey, go away!
Hey, what do you think you're doing?!
Sorry for asking you to stand guard.
No worries!
Oh, it won't stop here. Everything's falling apart.
Reminds me of the slums.
Are you done already?
Aerith?
Are you okay, Aerith?
What color does this look like to you?
It looks clear.
It used to be white.
At least, back when we were in Midgar...
Materia is condensed lifestream. It's infused with memories, knowledge...
Did the Whispers take it?
Was it something precious?
Yes, very much so.
Weren't you going to the beach? Maybe you should invite Tifa and go into town.
Yeah...
It would be best not to move around alone. If you're heading out, take Tifa with you.
Hey, Tifa, ready to head out? How are you doing on preparations?
Uh...yeah, just a bit longer.
Sorry for the wait.
We better find some cute clothes in town.
Tifa
And then, we hit the beach!
Let's get going!
Let's get going!
Costa! Are you ladies headed down to the beach?
If you're looking for some resort wear, why not join our 'Costa del Amor' event?
Amor?
It's a game event to help you make unforgettable memories here at Costa.
There are even games where you can play with your pets.
Wow, that sounds fun!
Right? Then here's a pair of tickets for you.
And a bonus ticket for your dog.
With these tickets...
you can race in the 'Run Wild' course, 'Ride with Wheelies,' and let's see...
You can join the 'Happy Tender Challenge' and the 'Royal Concert'!
Make some wonderful memories!
Costa~!
Costa~!
Yeah!
This looks fun!
Let's go!
Tifa, should I go first?
Sure, leave it to me.
Aerith, after you.
Alright, here I go!
Want to switch?
Yup, sure thing.
So, where to next?
Hehe, leave it to me!
Alright, Tifa!
Got it, follow me.
Let's share, let's share.
Alright, I'll go first.
Please, Tifa!
Leave it to me!
Hey, Tifa! Look at that!
Oh noooo! I hope I can make it!
Johnny?
He said he was coming by ship, but then he switched to a helicopter instead.
He told me he'd arrive in two hours, but he showed up thirty minutes early...
The information from HQ is always so unreliable!
We're expecting an important Shinra guest, so I'm here to offer my formal welcome.
Maybe I should head to the hotel and prepare for their stay.
I wonder what kind of person those Shinra executives are.
Maybe he's a charming older gentleman.
I heard he looks great in a lab coat!
Hmm, is he here yet?
Actually, I heard he's already at the hotel.
What? Where's our welcome party then?
Tifa? Aerith? What are you doing here?
That's our question. And what's with the bag?
It's luggage for a Shinra executive. I'm taking it to the hotel.
Shinra?
Johnny, you always said you hated Shinra.
Mayor's orders...
He's done so much for me, I have to.
Don't look at me like that! I'm not some lowlife anymore!
We should go.
Yeah, you're right.
Let's go!
Pretty cool, huh?
Well, Red? What do you think?
Huh?
Tifa, you're as sleek as a dolphin.
Tifa, you're as majestic as a whale.
And Aerith, you're as flexible as a jellyfish.
And Aerith, you're as spiral as a sea snail.
Is that your way of complimenting us?
Human beauty is...difficult for me to gauge.
How about it? Would you like to become my assistant? Shinra will take care of you for life.
Wow, what should I do?
For the experiment I'm currently planning, I need female assistants.
Yes, the creation of a new hero.
That's just like you, Professor!
A hero must possess awe-inspiring beauty before he vanquishes his enemy.
A hero is not simply made through their attributes and achievements. They are given the title based on the impression they leave.
Can you comprehend this?
I don't really get it, but it's incredible!
This area is off-limits.
Welcome, Professor! I hope my daughters are to your liking.
A man in a lab coat is simply irresistible.
Hey, Professor, how about letting me clean those glasses of yours?
Professor, how about trying some sweet, local fruit? Here, say 'ah'!
We have no choice but to take them down.
Hell yeah!
We need to hold them off here.
Got it!
Try and stop us!
How serendipitous! To think we could even capture an Ancient!
Welcome back, Aerith.
Cloud!
Oh no!
Ah, a new test subject... Not bad at all.
Wouldn't you be curious about creating a hero yourself?
Let me go...!
Well, that's everyone. Time to take my leave.
Not so fast!
Didn't mean to interrupt.
No, you helped us out.
We can't just keep fighting like this.
I've got a plan. Keep it distracted for a bit!
I... It's all my fault...
Hey, you! Mister!
Johnny.
Yuffie!

You wanna help, right?
Then lend me a hand!
Alright, let's finish this up.
Johnny, no! It's dangerous!
What the heck?
Caught ya!
Ninja Art: Thunder Sky!
How do you like that!
Let's stop here. We've done enough.
It's all ruined, thanks to Hojo.
No... maybe it's our fault. I can't keep my cool when it comes to him.
Yeah, it's because of us...
Don't worry about it.
We had no choice.
That's right.
Don't worry about it. Anyone would have reacted the same way seeing that happen right in front of them.
Yeah, next time I'll bite him to shreds.
We had no choice. If we hadn't fought, things would have been worse.
True, let's go with that.
Yeah, you're right. Maybe I could've handled it better.
Leave me alone for a while, please.
Go check on everyone.
Hate to admit it, but Yuffie really saved our skins back there.
Unlike me. I couldn't do a damn thing for them.
Couldn't save the guys with the black cloaks...
Your heart was in the right place.
This is Hojo's fault.
It was their fate.
The fact you wanted to help is what's important, right?
You trying to cheer me up? Now I've seen it all.
Don't blame yourself. This is on Hojo.
Damn right. We can't let him get away with it. We'll make him pay.
Guess it was just meant to be.
Seriously? Pulling that card now? That's just pathetic, even as an excuse.
I'd love to show Marlene this beautiful ocean one day.
Couldn't find the bartender, so I just went ahead and made a drink myself.
'Costa del Sol.'
I used to make these at the bar and would always say someday I'd be drinking one here.
Mixing drinks at Seventh Heaven feels like a lifetime ago.
Being at Seventh Heaven feels like ages ago.
A lot has happened since then.
Do you want to go back?
It hasn't been that long.
Yeah, a lot has happened.
Cloud, do you ever wish you could forget the painful and sad memories?
It's a part of who we are. The harder it is, the more unforgettable.
Yeah, I feel the same way.
Do you want to go back?
To the bar? Of course.
But right now, I know we have to keep moving forward.
Though my feelings do waver from time to time.
It hasn't been that long yet.
I know, but...
Hey, should I make one for you too?
Nah, it's okay.
I'll have a cocktail when the new Seventh Heaven is up and running.
That's what I promised Barret, anyway.
When did you make that promise?
It's a secret.
I don't see why it has to be a secret, but okay.
Someday, when things have settled down, I'd love to just sit quietly and gaze at the ocean.

Midgar...
It's just across the sea, right?
My real mother was named Ifalna.
Hojo captured her because she was a Cetra and did terrible things to her.
That's why I despise him.
Sometimes, I imagine seeking revenge on him.
I think such horrible things that I start to scare myself.
I start thinking things so horrible that it scares me.
Don't worry about it.
Everyone has someone they hate.
Don't overthink it.
They're just thoughts. Let them be as dark and ugly as you need.
Don't worry.
You think so?
Everybody feels hate at some point. Don't let it bother you.
But it bothers me.
You're overthinking it.
But...
Decide when the time comes.
Go with your feelings.
No matter what, I'll help you.
That's reassuring.
Let's head back.
We'll decide when the time comes.
Yeah, that's right.
When that time comes, I'm counting on you.
Yeah.
No, not you. I'm relying on my future self.
She’ll be an amazing woman, I promise.
Don't miss it.
I'll never forget today.
Late to the party again... My Shinra career is over.
I've made up my mind. I'm done with this company! I quit!
Damn you, Shinra!
Damn you, Shinra!
Damn you, Shinra...
Hey, you heading out already?
Head back to the inn?
Yes
No
Take it easy. Make sure to check on everybody.
Looks like vacation's over.
Yeah, though we had a bit of a ruckus.
Should we head back to the inn?
The far-from-the-beach Seaside Johnny's, huh?
What's up, everyone!
Johnny, are you okay?
I'm totally fine!
Thanks to you, we're saved.
Well, actually... some girls who saw my epic performance told me about it.
About the hotel and Mayor Kapono.
I was completely fooled... I couldn't see a thing.
You borrowed money, right? Can you pay it back?
About that!
The girls told Kapono, 'If you keep exploiting our hero, we'll expose your crimes to the world!'
And the crazy thing is, it worked. He caved.
I am footloose and debt-free, baby!
That's great.
Johnny, the local hero...
Proprietor of the Seaside Inn─soon-to-be seven-star resort hotel!
Now that would be something.
Ya know ya gotta get one star before you can get the other six, right?
Uh... You okay there?
Very funny, but I got plans─
Now watch him fall up the stairs.
Yes, thank you.
Thanks for everything.
Nah, I should be the one thanking you.
So, what are you guys planning to do next?
We're tracking someone in black robes.
Those guys headed toward Mt. Corel this morning.
Some of them were injured, so I tried to make them stay, but...
Mt. Corel...
Let's go too.
Be careful, my esteemed guests! Have a great journey!
Seaside Johnny here! Watch me rise again like a phoenix from the ashes!
Feel free to use any of the rooms or beds if you need some rest.
You're always welcome, bro!
Hey everyone, did you forget about me?
Welcome aboard, Yuffie.
If you try anything funny─anything─
I'll stuff you into the Junon cannon and blast you straight at Wutai.
Yikes!
Got it!
Yuffie Kisaragi, ready to give it my all!
Out of service...
Think we can climb it?
We'll be fine! Just enjoy the view.
Nothing much to look at.
Only thing you'll see is a busted reactor.
Right... You know this area well, don't you?
Let's get going.
Hey, Cloud.
Did you know materia is just condensed mako?
Yeah, I do.

In other words, where there's a mako reactor...
there's bound to be materia...
Okay, time to get moving! Let's kick it up a notch!
Yuffie, we're a team now, so no more acting on your own.
So, you're saying I need your permission for everything?
That's right.
Oh, really? Can I sing then?
Huh?
Can I scratch my back?
Can I clean my ears?
Can I yawn?
Hey, hey, can I?
Hey, hey, hey! Can I?!
Shut up! Everything's a mess!
Abuse of power! You're a tyrant, a tyrant!
Tifa, how do you manage to fight alongside someone like him?
Well, he has more good points than bad.
Oh, you mean it's like 51 good to 49 bad?
There's a bit more of a difference.
So it's like 55 good to 45 bad?
Yeah, something like that.
Tifa, you too?
Think Aerith might need a break.
Sorry... My legs are killing me.
Let's rest for a bit.
But if we stop now, the materia─I mean the guys in black cloaks─might get away!
Hey, I know! I'll go ahead and scout the area!
You guys can catch up later. See you soon!
"Catch up later," my ass.
I'll go too. Barret's acting kind of odd.
I'm counting on you.
I'll be waiting up ahead, so take your time.
Thank you. I'll take care of it.
Aerith, how are you holding up?
It's strange - I feel so light!
Is someone...helping me along?
It seems the mountain welcomes you.
Really?

Wow, really?
Hey there, nice to meet you!
Red, don't mess around.

It's a common experience for beginners.
If she collapses, I'll carry her.
Alright, let's go!
Sigh...
Hikers these days have no manners.
Greeting each other is basic mountain etiquette.
Well, I'll be. Finally, folks who've got some manners.
I don't get it. There are more hikers than usual today, but none of them even bothered to say hello.
I even tried calling out to some men in black capes who looked sick, but they ignored me.
Seriously, don't hikers know their manners anymore?
Speaking of which, a lively young girl just dashed past here.
She didn't even acknowledge me.
A big guy and a young lady went running after her too.
You know, helping each other out is crucial in the mountains.
That's a Shinra helicopter.
Do you think Yuffie and the others are okay?
Let's hurry.
C'mon, hurry up and get out.
The Turks...
Oh, hello there!
Are you following us?
Huh? No, not at all.
These guys got lost in Junon and...
When we were bringing them back, they suddenly caused a ruckus. So we decided to drop them off.
Not sure why they suddenly started acting up.
Oh well, it's not my job to figure it out.
So... you're leaving now?
Well, since you're here...
I'd love to stay and chat, but I'm afraid I'm a bit busy.
So, you'll have to put up with her for today.
Next time, I'm getting my revenge.
Here they come!
You're done for!
We did it!
The Turks are back in action.
Those annoying workaholics.
Right!
Let's hurry. Barret and the others are waiting.
The next topic is the Huge Materia Project.
Unusual energy reactions were detected simultaneously at mako reactors all around the world.
After thorough analysis of the data from each site...
we concluded that there is a very high chance of the existence of enormous life forms.
My beloved Weapon...
Based on ancient records, that name appears to be accurate.
These monsters appear when the planet is threatened.
Each one contains a massive orb of materia within its body.
Or rather, it might be more accurate to say that the huge materia took on a biological form.
Ever since I learned of their existence, I've been yearning to find them. They are the very mystery of the planet and life itself.

I want to explore every crevice and fold
with my own hands...to see it all with these scientific eyes!
Hojo
Your dream will soon be realized with this project.
We'll secure the Huge Materia and achieve our goals.
I don't accept this.

We're so close to developing artificial Huge Materia.
Why waste time with this?
Of course, I'm aware of your progress.

But this project's goal is to recover
naturally occurring specimens.
Maybe we could display them in the lobby?

I don't care about the Materia, but I'll take
the carcasses. They're mine.
Mr. President, please. What's the real story behind this?
Wutai is targeting them.
You should have led with that.
Heidegger, I need to borrow the military.
I'll prepare our elite forces for you.
President Rufus.
What is it?
There's a question I never got to ask your father.
May I now ask you the same question?
Using Avalanche's operations as cover, the sabotage of the reactors and the destruction of Sector 7...
Your father claimed these measures were part of the Neo Midgar Project.
But in truth, we haven't found the promised land that's central to the Neo Midgar Project, nor do we even know what it is.
My father grew old. And he became desperate.
That's the only reason for those reckless actions.
This is a good time to bring up something that's been on my mind.
Why didn't anyone stop my father's mad schemes?
I want to transform Shinra into something greater—deeper.
Broader, faster, stronger, more resilient.
You who fought alongside my father—I have high expectations of you.
Show me loyalty greater than what you showed my father.
Aerith.
Which way is Midgar?
It should be to the east.
That way.
I wonder how Mom's doing.
She seemed fine when I saw her. Just a bit worried.
I'm such a bad daughter.
She'll understand once you explain everything.
That’s going to be a tough conversation.
Over here!
Sorry we're late!
You okay?
Yup! Really worked up a sweat!
So how'd recon go?
All clear! No nasty surprises. And...no materia.
We managed to catch her before she could get as far as the reactor.
Which is the whole reason we're here! So hurry it up or those hooded guys'll beat us to it!
Wow!
So that's it...
The Corel Mako Reactor.
Hey...so, what's the deal with all these creepy hooded guys anyway?
They're Shinra's victims.
Huh... Well, they're in good company, I'll give 'em that.
How you figure?
When Shinra invaded Wutai, it was... pretty bad.
They leveled towns, killed thousands.
And when the dust settled, they forced some B.S. truce on us.
I thought both sides wanted a cease-fire.
The old geezers at the top did, yeah...
but the rest of us were pissed! They'd been running Wutai into the ground for years...
I was fed up and ready to explode!
The angry citizens pinned their hopes on Colonel Lodbrok and his crew.
Three ex-SOLDIER deserters rallied to the cause.
Never heard of them.
They broke the old rusty chains of tradition and revitalized Wutai.
While doing so, they were joined by Governor Sarruf, an ally trusted by the colonel.
And that sparked a revolution, leading to the formation of the interim government.
A revolution, huh? Nice work!
Why an 'interim' government?
Because once the war with Shinra is over, the people will choose their true government.
Which is why we're doing everything we can to achieve independence as soon as possible.
Pretty exciting, huh?
Sih, sih, hah!
What's the holdup? Let's go!
Hey, come over here!
Hey, hey, is all of that really mako?
Yeah.
Then there must be some incredible materia here!
Like, absolutely amazing materia!
What's that!?
Whoa!
What was that just now?
A Weapon.
Guardians of the planet... They are said to appear when the planet is in grave danger.
They're one of Hojo's obsessions.
Hey! Did you see that!?
There was a massive materia inside it, right!?
Think we can somehow catch it?
Capture the guardian of the planet?
Don't you want such a huge materia? It's all mine though!
Well, take your time figuring it out. We're moving ahead.
What the hell!?
We'll meet again, sweet Weapon! Stay safe until then!
If a Weapon like that shows up, it means Shinra's pushed the planet too far.
So basically, Avalanche was right all along. Isn't that true?
Yeah, but it's not just Shinra we have to worry about.
It's Sephiroth, isn't it?
Let's go. We have to save the planet.
What's going on?
It's a drawbridge. We can't cross until we lower it.
What should we do?
What’s up?
Barret, do you know something about this place?
We can lower the bridge from the control room up there, at the top of the cliff.
How do we get there?
We go through the mine.
It’s been abandoned for a long time, so I have no idea what condition it’s in.
I'll lower the bridge. Hold on a minute!
Hey!
Barret.
Cloud!
It could be the effect of the mako. He should rest for a while.
Let's let Cloud rest while we go lower the bridge.
Sounds good.
I'll call you when we're done, so rest up until then.
Alright, let's get moving!
I'll be okay. Just give me a moment to recover.
You go on ahead. I'll take care of Cloud.
Uh... Which way?
We can get up there with that thing... but we need to turn on the power first.
The generator's over there.
Use that grappling hook. Jumping around is your specialty, right?
Hehe, it's my time to shine!
We need to unlock it from the control unit on the floor above.
Can you handle it?
Do I have a choice?
You got this?
Piece of cake!
Again? Really?
They really don't go easy on me, do they?
Cheep cheep cheep!
Oh!?
Peep peep peep!
We have to help them!
Way ahead of ya!
Hey! Over here, birdbrain!
You good?
Oh yeah!
Think a tornado's gonna save you, bird?
